title: Solutions Specialist
content:
At Qualtrics, we create software the world’s best brands use to deliver exceptional frontline experiences, build high-performing teams, and design products people love. But we are more than a platform—we are the creators and stewards of the Experience Management category serving over 18K clients globally. Building a category takes grit, determination, and a disdain for convention—but most of all it requires close-knit, high-functioning teams with an unwavering dedication to serving our customers. When you join one of our teams, you’ll be part of a nimble group that’s empowered to set aggressive goals and move fast to achieve them. Strategic risks are encouraged and complex problems are solved together, by passing the microphone and iterating until the best solution comes to light. You won’t have to look to find growth opportunities—ready or not, they’ll find you. From retail to government to healthcare, we’re on a mission to bring humanity, connection, and empathy back to business. Join over 6,000 people across the globe who think that’s work worth doing.
The Role: As a member of the Qualtrics Research Services Team, you will be responsible for learning about our partner network and finding the best partners for our academic, corporate, and enterprise clients. Additionally, you will be tasked with selecting the correct vendor for each project and assisting with pricing and strategy. This role requires attention to detail and the ability to work well with multiple teams, including Sales, Research Delivery, and customers.
Why We have this Role: The Qualtrics Research Services Team is instrumental in contributing to Qualtrics' overall revenue. With our business unit growing at an incredible rate, there is a pressing need to hire top talent to keep up with demand. This role plays a crucial part in ensuring that the right partners are selected for each project, allowing us to deliver high-quality solutions to our clients.
How You'll Find Success: 

Ability to work closely with the sales team to scope out projects and select the appropriate vendors. 
Deep understanding of market research and being able to design solutions that meet the specific business needs of our clients. 
Attention to detail and ability to recognize challenges in potential projects 
Ability to provide recommendations and ensure the successful execution of each project

How You'll Grow: In this role, you will have the opportunity to expand your knowledge and skills in market research and solution design. You will have access to market research courses and Qualtrics certification courses to further develop your expertise in these areas. Additionally, you will work collaboratively with various teams within Qualtrics, allowing you to gain business acumen and technical abilities that will help you effectively leverage the power of the Qualtrics platform. This role offers ample opportunities for personal and professional growth.
Things You'll Do:

Coordinate with external market research partners to ensure the success of each research project
Oversee the bidding process for 5-15 new projects daily
Continuously gain knowledge through market research courses and Qualtrics certification courses
Collaborate with Sales, Research Services, Engineering, and other teams to create compelling solutions
Assist in driving sales pipeline and achieving Research Services billing targets
Articulate the business value of solutions by understanding customer's business requirements
Drive operational efficiencies across the Research Services team
Stay updated with market trends, target industry insights, competition, and industry regulatory/compliance requirements
Maintain expert knowledge of the Qualtrics Brand Experience, Core XM, and other products
Take ownership of opportunities, work independently, manage multiple projects, and adapt to ambiguity and last-minute changes

What We're Looking for on Your Resume:

Bachelor's degree (or international equivalent)
Detail-oriented mindset
Ability to work well with Sales, Research Delivery, and customers
Strong affinity for market research, research design, solution selling, technology, and customer engagement
Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to articulate market research methodologies and technical concepts to customers
1 - 2 years of experience in the SaaS or Market Research industry is preferred

What You Should Know about this Team: 

The Qualtrics Research Services Team is one of the largest and most consistent contributors to Qualtrics' overall revenue. 
Close-knit team that values collaboration and innovation. 
We work closely with various stakeholders to deliver high-quality solutions to our clients. 
Our team thrives in a dynamic and fast-paced environment.

Our Team's Favorite Perks and Benefits:

Work-life integration: frequent office events, team outings, and happy hours
Qualtrics Experience Bonus (+ 1,800 USD gross per calendar year) is a program designed to provide experiences to our employees they might not otherwise have.
Creative office design fostering innovation and collaboration
Up to the value of MXN 6,250 per quarter can be reimbursed for a variety of wellness activities via our dedicated platform, Forma.
Qualtrics pays 100% of the premiums for employees and their dependents. Medical and Vision plans are through MetLife, Dental plan is through Dentegra, and Minor Medical Insurance is through MediAccess.
15 days per year (2 additional days per year after the 10th year, up to 25 days)

demographic_questions.description:
DEI (Diversity, Equity and Inclusion) is a cornerstone of our company culture. With strong views on diversity and inclusion, immigration, wage equality, and the universality of human rights—without regard to race, color, creed, gender, or sexual orientation— we will not be quiet but will amplify these views on behalf of our employees and organization. 

With this in mind, we invite you to participate in the following set of voluntary demographic questions. The data collected will be used anonymously and in aggregate, so we can evaluate our processes to ensure we're providing equal opportunities to applicants from all backgrounds. Your responses, or your choice not to respond, will not be associated with your specific application and will not in any way be used for individual hiring or compensation decisions.

questions.label: How do you currently describe your gender identity?
Where have you seen Qualtrics prior to applying? Select all that apply.

values.label: I am a member of the Qualtrics Talent Community
I learned about Qualtrics from a current employee (social networking, referral, word of mouth)
I attended a networking event or career fair
I have seen Qualtrics on social media (LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, etc)
I found Qualtrics through a third-party career site (Indeed, Glassdoor, University website, niche networking site, etc)
I have read content created by Qualtrics
I have used the Qualtrics product suite
I googled jobs and a Qualtrics role was suggested
I am a current Qualtrics employee

questions.label: This role requires a minimum of Professional Working proficiency in English. Do you meet this requirement?
What year did you graduate with you Bachelor's degree (or International equivalent)?
Are you of legal age to work in the country in which this position is based?
Are you legally authorized to work in the country in which this position is located?
Do you now or will you in the future require Qualtrics to sponsor your employment in the country in which this position is located?
Are you willing to undergo a background check as part of this hiring process?
Have you ever worked at Qualtrics in the following capacities? (check all that apply):

values.label: I have not worked for Qualtrics in the past

questions.label: Are you related to a current employee of Qualtrics? If yes, please specify name and relationship. A "relative" is defined as one of the following: spouse or significant other, parent/step parent, child/step child, grandparent, grandchild, brother, sister, uncle, aunt, nephew, niece, first cousin, in-laws (mother, father, sister, brother, daughter, son).
